amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve funds relating to imposing sanctions with respect to foreign persons responsible for gross violations of internationally recognized human rights or significant acts of corruption and to encourage the Secretary of State to add additional names to the Magnitsky List.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1104 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1104 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Wicker. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2021) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve funds relating to imposing sanctions with respect to foreign persons responsible for gross violations of internationally recognized human rights or significant acts of corruption and to encourage the Secretary of State to add additional names to the Magnitsky List.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1104 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1104 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Wicker.
